name: Project 75
title: Project 75
shortDescription: Fast-paced mini-games for a game jam.
longDescription:
Set in Morocco, 2100, Project 75 is a fast-paced mini-game collection developed during a game jam. The player takes on the unusual role of a mischievous devil whose only way to progress is by interfering, sabotaging, and influencing events across a series of chaotic micro-challenges.

Each mini-game introduces a new mechanic and scenario, keeping the experience unpredictable and energetic. As the player advances, the visual style evolves starting with rough, sketch-like scenes that gradually transform to reflect a shifting vision of Morocco’s future.

team: Game Artists: Badr BENFANICH, Soulayman ECHATOUI

article.content: How I Built a Video Game in 3 Days at the Morocco 2100 Game Jam, My First Game Jam Experience
